summary: An ordinance authorizing the Seattle Electric Company to surrender and release the franchise granted by Ordinance No. 22933, releasing the Seattle Electric Company, its successors and assigns, from all obligations and liabilities imposed by Ordinance No. 22933, authorizing and directing the return of the Seattle Electric Company of certain deposits made by it under said Ordinance No. 22933, and authorizing the payment by the proper city officials, to the Seattle Electric Company of the costs and expenses of the City Electric Company in connection with the advertising and publishing of the franchise granted by said Ordinance No. 22933.
